ItemTooltips.magic_stick: Grab this at the start if you're laning against a Bat Rider.
ItemTooltips.bottle: you should be able to farm this fairly quickly with the standard solo mid starting items above.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: Depends on your line up. Someone should have this, and DP is a reasonable candidate.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: After Heart/Skadi grab this. You won't be able to go OoM if you try.
ItemTooltips.cyclone: This should solve typical mana issues. Also great to activate when your ghosts start returning to you if you're still in danger and need HP back fast.
ItemTooltips.heart: Grab this against ranged and high-mobility melee carries.
ItemTooltips.skadi: Grab this only if you're up against a low mobility melee carry (not Anti-mage/Nighstalker).

AbilityTooltips.death_prophet_silence: Grab this at level 2 or 4 depending on your situation.
